what: Similarity Score and Inter-Annotator Agreement Calculation
title: Similarity Score and Inter-Annotator Agreement Calculation
text: package aims calculate flexible segmentation similarity measure corresponding inter-annotator agreement score (two annotators). currently development. score similar lexical edit distance (Fournier & Inkpen 2013), can evaluate similarity two segmentations text multiple, mutually exclusive boundary types, also account varying identifiability confusability boundary types.
